#059669)',color:'#0b0b0b',border:'none',padding:'10px 12px',borderRadius:10,cursor:'pointer',fontFamily:'monospace',fontSize:13},children:"Apply recommended optimizations"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onExportMetrics,style:{background:'transparent',color:'#E0F2F1',border:'1px solid rgba(224,242,241,0.25)',padding:'10px (CSV)"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:_objectSpread({},cardStyle),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{fontFamily:'monospace',fontSize:14,marginBottom:10,opacity:0.9},children:"Context & lists."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"Lazy-load videos and images; avoid autoplay."})]})]})]})]})]});}
